issue.title: polaris steering angle -> vehicle velocity bug

content.raw: Try the code in branch vehicle_plugin_updates. In changeset 3b71061, I made it so torque is limited at both left and right wheels when one of them reaches the max speed. Before this, it was applying some weird differential torque, which aggravates the slip. There's still an fdir1 problem though; the vehicle drives in a square more than a circle.
